titleStmt.title: The order of assistance given to the committees of both houses, concerning their going to Hull. April.28. 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print signed by. Jo. Browne Cler. Parl.

Order to Lord-Lieutenants, Sheriffs, &c., to aid and assist the Earl of Stamford, Lord Willoughby of Parham, sir Edward Ayscoghe, .. sent by the Lords and Commons to the counties of York and Lincoln, and the town of Kingston-upon-Hull, for special service for His Majesty and the peace and safety of the kingdom, &c. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
